src:
Klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019: Bali United Tetap di Puncak
01 Nov 2019, 07:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bali United hanya mampu meraih hasil imbang 1-1 melawan Borneo FC pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 di Stadion Kapten I Wayan Dipta, Gianyar, Kamis (31/10/2019). Kendati demikian, mereka tetap berada di puncak klasemen Shopee Liga 1 2019.
Tim berjulukan Serdadu Tridatu ini mengumpulkan 55 poin dari 24 laga hasil dari 17 kemenangan, empat imbang, dan tiga kali kalah. Ditahan imbang Persela membuat rekor kemenangan Bali United di kandang musim ini terhenti.
Sejauh ini, Bali United telah 13 kali bertindak sebagai tuan rumah, dengan 12 partai di antaranya berujung kemenangan.
Bagi Persela, hasil seri ini gagal membuat mereka menggeser Persija Jakarta di peringkat ke-14. Tim beralias Laskar Joko Tingkir ini tertahan di posisi ke-15 dengan raupan 24 poin dari 25 laga.
Sementara itu di laga lainnya, Barito Putera berhasil mengalahkan Borneo FC di Stadion Demang Lehman, Martapura, Kamis (31/10/2019). Namun, kemenangan ini tetap membuat Samsul Arif dan kawan-kawan bercokol di posisi ke-12 setelah meraih 29 poin dari 26 partai.
Bagi Borneo FC, mereka juga stagnan di peringkat keempat via 41 poin dari 25 laga.
text:
Shopee Liga 1 Standings 2019: Bali United Remains Top
Nov 1 2019, 07:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Bali United was only able to achieve a 1-1 draw against Borneo FC in the 26th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019 at the Captain I Wayan Dipta Stadium, Gianyar, Thursday (10/31/2019). Nevertheless, they remain at the top of the 2019 Shopee Liga 1.
The team nicknamed Serdadu Tridatu collected 55 points from 24 matches resulting from 17 wins, four draws and three defeats. Persevered by a draw Persela made a record of Bali United's victory at home this season stopped.
So far, Bali United has acted as the host 13 times, with 12 parties leading to victory.
For Persela, the results of this series failed to make them shift Persija Jakarta in 14th place. The team of Laskar Joko Tingkir is stuck in 15th place with 24 points from 25 matches.
Meanwhile in another match, Barito Putera defeated Borneo FC at Demang Lehman Stadium, Martapura, Thursday (10/31/2019). However, this victory still makes Samsul Arif and his friends entrenched in 12th position after winning 29 points from 26 parties.
For Borneo FC, they also stagnated in fourth place via 41 points from 25 matches.
